title: When Will Trump Be Indicted for These Crimes?
description:

title: Trump’s Lawyer Joe Tacopina Donated to Democratic Rep Who Called for Trump’s Prosecution
description:
Kathleen Rice, at the time a House member from New York, sent a criminal referral to the FBI in 2021.

title: Is Chicago Mayoral Candidate Paul Vallas a Republican?
description:
In the past, Vallas took a Republican endorsement and toyed with switching parties. Today, despite GOP support, he’s distancing himself from the party.

The post Is Chicago Mayoral Candidate Paul Vallas a Republican? appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Prosecution of Trump Is a Good First Step. Now Do Bush.
description:
New York's case against Trump would be a mere footnote of history if the U.S. actually believed in holding presidents and other top officials accountable.
